Text: Steel InformationMike My name is Brian Dawson and I work in ENA Merchant Finance I heard you speak at the Adams Mark Hotel last week discussing the future of EGM I wanted to let you know that I may have some information that might be useful to you I have a close friend who is the Vice President MarketingPurchasing of Rigid Building Systems located off of Aldine Westfield and Beltway He has over years in the industry of buying from the mills and selling steel components to contractors end users and service centers We were discussing the steel industry as a whole and some of his ideals were identical to yours I didnt know if you would be the right person for this information If you would like for me to forward this information to someone else please let me know Thank you for your consideration Brian Dawson
